description: This file defines a React-like component (using LightningJS framework) for a Quiz page in a quiz application. It includes UI layout, state management, and methods for loading questions, selecting options, and navigating to results.

classes.name: QuizPage
classes.description: A LightningJS component for displaying quiz questions, options, and handling user interactions in a quiz application.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads current question data into the component state, resetting selection and updating options.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Handles user selecting an answer option, updating background colors to indicate selection.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Advances to the next question, updating score if correct, or navigates to results when quiz ends.

calls: r.navigate('/results', { state: { score: this.$state.score, total: quiz.length } })
